name: magnumt
text: I tell that to whoever says they don't know what to do with their lives.

name: professoryes
text: I'm a social work major, and I think that's a fairly good estimation of what to tell someone without goals.

name: gumfish
text: I read that as "without goats", and I found I didn't really have a problem with that.

name: dovey
text: I envy you

name: eric
text: Billy Idol should never give advice to children.  It seems like a bad idea.

name: zapatos
text: A dangerous idea?  I sexy idea?  Maybe a little bit of both?

name: havenless
text: I think he manages quite well despite being an otter child

name: jamers
text: That is all.

name: ndpatel
text: This is the greatest Achewood strip of all time. I am appalled it does not have a 5/5.

name: brzbee
text: This strip is my new philosophy on life

name: professoryes
text: I wish death really worked like this: The person closest to you doing the thing you love most when you die becomes possessed by you.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Never watch porn near a place where I am hanging out then.

name: semiquaver
text: Well I mean that depends are you a good person to be posessed by and so on.

name: dusty
text: No, masturbation won't make you go blind son, but you may end up with the voice of a horny old dead guy in your head.

name: falseprophet
text: Well don't fret none Philippe I mean if you're doing it right your sexiness is your danger which is stone two birds with one stone and with the ghost of Billy Idol showin you the way you ain't got shit to worry bout.

name: heccibiggs
text: Why did this get two lames? There's nothing lame about this.

name: falseprophet
text: I told you once before: the weak-minded cannot abide when people believe in themselves on the Internet.

name: farqussus
text: One lame for each missing full stop?

name: carlyle
text: You mean... you mean a period?

name: farqussus
text: teehee

name: windfish
text: The last words of Billy's soul constitute all eleven of my middle names.

name: vreeeee
text: Our mama didn't name you that!

name: cyberia
text: He wants Philippe to have wicked sack.

name: charchar
text: Man, Billy Idol would say that. He is always messing with the littluns.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Not messing with. Inspiring. Guiding. Empowering. Truly, Mr. Idol, that is all.

name: nice-on-merlot
text: No, you're thinking of Gary Glitter.

name: donnatron
text:
A mixture of sexiness and danger...but used ONLY FOR GOOD!

We love you, Billy Idol.

name: wonelove
text:
that is all...
that is all that is necessary

name: dumase
text:
"What do you want me to do, Billy?"

This is a story arc that could have ended very badly.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Life should be a mix of sexiness and danger. That would rule.

name: fineoakstructure
text: You need to go bowling more often, my friend.

name: mbain3001
text: Last time I went bowling was with my parents. It wasn't sexy, but a little dangerous. I nearly dropped a ball.

name: atypicaloracle
text:
I'm totally taking that the wrong way. The dangerous and sexy way.

Basically it is a joke about puberty which is actually way more dangerous and generally none of the sexy.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Oh you are the limit.

Basically it is a rite of passage among the natives, frot with danger.

Would chubby again.

name: sustainability
text: How does one frot without danger?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: One muft aske if life if even worth living if one frotteth without danger?

name: terribleman
text: Last time I went bowling I went home with a chick I had never met before and got mad ruddy all night. Bowling grew on me that night.

name: cygnusx-1
text: Simple and poignant. One of my favorite strips.
